source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_SEQ_00<tab>Curious Gorge is struggling to decipher the ancient texts.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_SEQ_00<tab>キュリアス・ゴージは、古文書の解読に苦戦しているようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_SEQ_01<tab>Curious Gorge has been unable to glean much wisdom from the ancient tome, but would proceed with your training nonetheless. He has tasked you with the slaying of a giant sandworm rumored to reside in the Sagolii Desert. Stop off at Forgotten Springs and ask the inhabitants there if they have seen the creature.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_SEQ_01<tab>キュリアス・ゴージから依頼を受けた。南ザナラーンの「忘れられたオアシス」で「サンドウォーム」の話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_SEQ_02<tab>According to the residents of Forgotten Springs, the sandworm you seek was last seen preying on a band of unfortunate merchants in the Sagolii Desert. Seek out an area that shows vestiges of a massacre and fell the immense beast.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_SEQ_02<tab>サンドウォームの話を聞いた。南ザナラーンのサゴリー砂漠にある放棄された荷物付近で「サンドウォーム」を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_SEQ_03<tab>The sandworm is no more. Return to Hidden Falls and inform Curious Gorge that you have completed your trial.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_SEQ_03<tab>サンドウォームを討伐した。東ラノシアの隠れ滝にいる「キュリアス・ゴージ」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_SEQ_04In the course of your battle with the sandworm, your inner beast has awakened further, imparting to you yet another technique of your forebears. Master the newfound skill at your disposal, that you will be prepared to continue your training once your mentor has deciphered the ancient texts.

※The next warrior quest will be available from Curious Gorge upon reaching level 40.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_SEQ_04キュリアス・ゴージに報告した。報告すると、彼は新しい技を教えてくれた。次なる技の習得に向け、さらなる鍛錬を積もう。

※戦士のレベルが40以上になると、キュリアス・ゴージから次の戦士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_TODO_00<tab>Speak with residents of Forgotten Springs.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_TODO_00<tab>忘れられたオアシスでサンドウォームの話を聞く

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_TODO_01<tab>Slay the giant sandworm in the Sagolii Desert.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_TODO_01<tab>サゴリー砂漠の放棄された荷物付近でサンドウォームを討伐
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_TODO_02<tab>隠れ滝のキュリアス・ゴージに報告

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_000<tab>Welcome back, my friend. I can see that you've not neglected your training. For my part, I fear that deciphering the ancient chronicles of my people is proving to be a much more demanding task than I had imagined.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_000おお、オメ、ますます斧の腕を上げたな！
それにひきかえ、オラの解読はあんまり進んでねえ……。
オメは頑張ってるっていうのに、ごめんな！！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_001<tab>Mind you, it hasn't helped that I've been somewhat preoccupied of late. A comrade of mine from my days in the Company of Heroes asked me to do a favor, and it's taken me back and forth across the realm like some bloody ferry.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_001オラ、昔、「海雄旅団」にいてな。
そこで世話になった先輩たちの用心棒の仕事を
鍛錬がてら手伝ってんだが……最近、忙しいんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_002<tab>I'm on a hunt for some mysterious feral beast that's been terrorizing smallfolk. People don't know where this monstrosity came from, but witnesses say its thirst for blood is unlike anything they've ever seen.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_002詳しいことは知らねえけど、最近、
「毛もじゃの怪物」が暴れまわってて、
その気にあてられた魔物が凶暴化してるんだと。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_003<tab>Unfortunately, the time I have spent in pursuit of the beast is time I have not spent studying the chronicles, and I am sorry to say I have made little progress.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_003凄腕の先輩たちが苦労する怪物だって、
「古の戦装束」さえあれば、
オラがそれ着て、退治してやれるってのにな……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_004<tab>However, while on the road, I was able to decipher one passage that may be of interest to us both. From what I can gather, the chronicles tell of an ancient set of armor forged by my ancestors in the flames of the seven hells, and inscribed with the same arcane incantations that adorn the Soul of the Warrior.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_004「古の戦装束」ってのは、昔の偉大な戦士が着てたもんだ。
「原初の魂」を揺さぶる、特別なまじないが
施されてる戦装束だ……って兄者が言ってたぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_005<tab>It would seem that this mighty armor was passed down from hero to apprentice for centuries, until one man, driven by rage and vainglory, cast all five pieces from Abalathia's highest peak. Since that day, the armor has remained lost...and with it, the power that it harbors.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_005なんでもエオルゼア全土に散らばってて、
全部を見つけるには、「天の大柱」って呼ばれるほど高い
里のお山を4つ越えるより、時間も手間もかかるんだとさ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_006<tab>As far as I can make out, the next passage in the chronicles concerns the whereabouts of these missing artifacts...though I have only been able to make sense of the odd word thus far. Still, I must confess to some excitement. Imagine what a warrior clad in such garb could achieve!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_006詳しいありかは、古文書に記されてるはずなんだけど、
これがまだ読み取れてねえんだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_007<tab>Ah, if only my brother were here... We could decipher the text together and spread the teachings of our people to the entire realm!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_007兄者がいてくれれば、もっと早く読めるのになぁ……。
兄者はすげえんだ、里の誰よりも強くって賢いんだから！
ああ、今すぐオメに兄者を会わせてえなー！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_008<tab>Alas, he is not. His whereabouts are as hidden to me as those of the ancient armor. I would have liked you to meet him...if only so that you could have looked upon a true warrior.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_008<tab>……そのうち、どこかで会えるだろうって？

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_009<tab>Well, perhaps you still shall. Eorzea is not as large as most people perceive. Paths cross, fates intertwine. Such is the will of the Spinner. It may be that my brother has chosen a similar path to mine... But I have rambled long enough. You are here to take the next step in your training, and so I shall oblige.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_009ありがとよ、オメの言うとおりだ！
オメ、兄者ぐれえ頼りになるな！
そうだ、今のオメなら次の技を覚えられるにちがいねえ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_010<tab>In the southern reaches of Thanalan is the Sagolii Desert, a godsforsaken wasteland of naught but sand that stretches as far as the eye can see. It is here that the leviathan of the dunes lurks─a sandworm of gargantuan proportions.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_010南ザナラーンのサゴリー砂漠には、
とびきりドデカい「サンドウォーム」がいるらしい。
こいつを倒してみろ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_011<tab>When facing this mammoth creature, you will soon realize that the feeble hacks and slashes of your puny axe are ill-suited to the task of felling such a foe...but do not let this dissuade you. Wake the slumbering beast within and summon forth a strength that transcends the limits of your physical form.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_011こういう強敵と全力で戦うと、「原初の魂」が奮い立つ。
そんなとき、「」がオメに活路を示してくれんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_012<tab>Mind you, first you'll have to <var 1A 02 /var>find<var 1A 01 /var> the beast, and that might prove a tall order in itself. The U tribe that inhabits Forgotten Springs is wise to the movements of the denizens of the desert. Should you want for guidance, I'd wager they could set you in the right direction.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_012ただ、目的のドデカい「サンドウォーム」が、
ドデカい砂漠のどこにいるかがわかんねえ。
南ザナラーンの「忘れられたオアシス」で、聞いてみてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_URALKA_000_020<tab>Aye, I've seen the beast. Stands three malms high, he does, and stirs up sandstorms with each writhe and wriggle. Showed up in my hunting fields some years ago, and has been swallowing up my would-be prey in that gaping maw of his ever since.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_URALKA_000_020ドデカいサンドウォーム……ねぇ。
確かに、並の大きさじゃない大物が、
数年周期で現れては、猟場を荒しやがるんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_UGOROMULI_000_021<tab>The leviathan of the dunes? Saw the fearsome bugger not a week ago, preying on a group of merchants south of Byregot's Strike. The smart ones dropped their wares, turned tail, and ran. The dumb ones, well, at least they can say they died rich.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_UGOROMULI_000_021ドデカいサンドウォームなら、数日前に現れたって話だ。
ビエルゴズ・ストライクの南で商隊が襲われたらしい。
商人たちは荷物を捨て、命からがら逃げ帰ってきたそうだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_UKHUBATIA_000_022<tab>Sandworms are particularly sensitive to vibrations in the earth, such as those made by running. If you're looking to summon one of the beasts, then I suggest you search for their tracks, then run about making as much of a clamor as possible. I would also suggest you seek a cure for your madness.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_UKHUBATIA_000_022地中の「サンドウォーム」は、
獲物の足音に反応して、襲ってくるんだ。
会いたいなら、ヤツが現れた痕跡の周囲を走り回るんだね。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_030<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Your crystal grows ever stronger. In felling the raging sandworm, the beast within you slowly but surely rouses to wakefulness.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_030戻ったか、早かったな。
オメの「」が光ってる……
戦いで奮い立ったオメの「原初の魂」と共鳴したんだな！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_031<tab>When next you do battle, methinks you will find yourself capable of movements heretofore unfamiliar to you. When you have mastered your new talents, return to me. In the meanwhile, I shall continue my study of the ancient texts.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR350_01050_CURIOUSGORGE_000_031それなら、新しい技が使えるはずだ。
さっそく強い魔物と戦って、使ってみろ。
オメが鍛錬してる間に、オラ、古文書の解読を急ぐからよ。
